title: New: Chelsea Burgin – Pocketful Of Dreams
body:
It’s been too long since we last checked in with **Chelsea Burgin**, and it would appear that things are very much on the up.

In a message posted on her Soundcloud, she states “I found this song I wrote a while back(and played guitar poorly to) and for some reason it seems fitting to share now”, however it doesn’t feel like just a throwaway track; there’s a genuine sincerity and understated beauty to _Pocketful Of Dreams_. As with previous songs, much of the breathtaking elegance comes from **Burgin’s** divine vocals, mixed with just the right amount of silky reverb. To quote again from her Soundcloud… _this is just the beginning…_
